name: vscode-speech-language-switch
description: Quickly switch the accessibility.voice.speechLanguage setting via a status bar icon
author: Tristan Teufel

speechLanguageSwitch.shortcuts.description: Configure keyboard shortcuts for quick language switching. Keys are language codes (e.g., 'en-US', 'de-DE'), values are keybindings (e.g., 'ctrl+alt+e').
speechLanguageSwitch.shortcuts.markdownDescription:
Configure keyboard shortcuts for quick language switching.

Example:
```json
{
  "en-US": "ctrl+alt+e",
  "de-DE": "ctrl+alt+d",
  "fr-FR": "ctrl+alt+f"
}
```

Available language codes: en-US, en-GB, de-DE, es-ES, fr-FR, it-IT, ja-JP, ko-KR, pt-BR, zh-CN, zh-TW, ru-RU, and more.

scripts.publish: vsce publish $VERSION -m 'chore: bump version to %s [skip ci]' && ovsx publish
scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
